extensionDescription.message: Streamus turns YouTube into the music player you always wanted. Streamus makes streaming YouTube refreshingly easy.

nextVideoCommandDescription.message: Tell Streamus to go to the next video in the stream.

previousVideoCommandDescription.message: Tell Streamus to go to the previous video in the stream.

toggleVideoCommandDescription.message: Tell Streamus to toggle (play/pause) the current video.

addPlaylistNoAddStreamWarning.message: You need to add items to your Playlist first.

videoCopyrightBanned.message: Unable to use video because it was banned on copyright grounds.

cantBanNeedMoreVideos.message: Your Stream is low on unbanned videos. Try adding more videos before banning again.

noVideosInStream.message: No Videos in Stream. Try clicking on a Playlist Item.

emptyFolder.message: This Folder is empty. Try adding some videos by clicking above.

emptyPlaylist.message: is empty. Try adding some videos by clicking above.

repeatDisabled.message: Repeat is disabled. Click to enable repeat video.

repeatVideo.message: Repeat video is enabled. Click to enable repeat playlist.

repeatStream.message: Repeat stream is enabled. Click to disable.

radioEnabled.message: Radio is enabled. Click to disable.

radioDisabled.message: Radio is disabled. Click to enable.

shuffleEnabled.message: Shuffling is enabled. Click to disable.

shuffleDisabled.message: Shuffling is disabled. Click to enable.

playDisabled.message: Play disabled. Try adding a video to your playlist, first!

clickToPlay.message: Click to play the current video.

clickToPause.message: Click to pause the current video.

backPreviousVideo.message: Go back to the previous video.

clickDragChangeTime.message: Click or drag to change the time.

clickDragChangeVolume.message: Click or drag to change the volume.

addErrorCheckUrl.message: There was an issue adding your playlist. Check the URL?

loadVideoBeforeFullScreen.message: Load a video before trying to go full screen

reloadPromptText.message: Streamus is taking a long time to load. Reloading may help.

searchInstructions.message: Start searching and results will appear here

videoDisplayEnabled.message: Video is visible. Click to hide.

videoDisplayDisabled.message: Video is hidden. Click to show.

createPlaylistPromptText.message: Enter a name for the playlist or use the one provided:

deletePlaylistPromptText.message: Are you sure you want to delete playlist
